name: Familiar (assybee4)
description:
You begin as a troll running from the drones , only to stumble upon a deeper part of the society you grew in that you never knew about in the first place.

While making friends along the way.

what will you do now?

Familiar is a game very much inspired by the homestuck universe, pesterquest and hiveswap friendsim. Please support the original works!

Familiar is also a game tied in with the trolls of "The Underside" which is a fan-made mspa style comic on  mspfa. You do not need to have read the comic to understand what's going on in this game.
